Name: World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon
About the game: This WINTER: Stay tuned! World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon Available NOW Welcome to the World CHAMPS League! World Champions: Decathlon is finally realeased! We will leave Playtest open for little longer, so You can play for free , test it and share feedback. Scores in Full Game start from scratch, Playtest scores remain only in Playtest. We are still imporving every aspect of the game. If You like the game, support it by purchase, share and compete with Family and Friends. See You on the Track&Field, Good Luck! World CHAMPS is a series of retro style sports games for whole Family. World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon includes all favorite disciplines: 100 metres, Long jump, Shot put, High jump, 400 metres 110 metres hurdles, Discus throw, Pole vault, Javelin throw and 1500 metres Wishlist, Follow on Steam and stay tuned! Compete with time in SIngle Player or in PvP Mode both - Online and Local! MAIN FEATURES: - Sports Simulator - 10 disciplines in Decathlon. - Single Player, Multiplayer - Local and Online. - Pixelart and animations - true to retro pixels and colors palette. - Simple Fun for People of all age - simple Controlls and Rules. - Character customization - choose Your Team or play solo. - Achivements and Leaderboards. more information and materials coming soon! Remember to Wishlist and we`ll see You on Track and Field! All the best!
